00110 inline bool ForcedClusteringAlgorithm::SortByDistanceToTrack(const TrackDistanceInfo &lhs, const TrackDistanceInfo &rhs)
00111 {
00112     return (lhs.GetTrackDistance() < rhs.GetTrackDistance());
00113 }
